title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content: he Grand Duke has been taken to Moonrise Towers. In Act 3, you can free Wyll's father whether or not you take Mizora's deals. In order to save duke Ravengard, you need to reach Iron Throne from Flymm Cargo. (Quest Save the Gondians and Avenge the Drowned will lead you to this location.)(Hatch to Flymm Cargo is hidden beneath some crates, at X-163, Y-143. Alternatively, you can reach Flymm Cargo basement through City Sewers.) You need to carefully select your team and spells before you reach Iron
